    %% Connections
    Client --> Core
    Core --> Components

    Actor <--> Config

    %% Component Connections

    EVCharger <--> PowerDist
    PV <--> PowerDist
    LogicalMeter <--> PowerDist

    %% Power Management Connections
    PowerDist <--> PowerManage

    Formula <--> TimeSeries

    %% Data Processing Connections
    DataSource --> RingBuffer
    RingBuffer --> MovingWindow
    MovingWindow --> Resampling
